column4: i can't figure out how to install grub, i use rescue mode of installer, then do grubinstall /dev/sdb and every time i boot it says "GRUB Loading stage1.5. GRUB loading, please wait... Error 17"
i did not install windows, i installed ubuntu on my 2nd hard drive
found info about error 17 if it helps :) http://hertenberger.co.za/?p=808
